ComicInfo.Summary: The Lurker Beneath Loch Fear!: Hulk is caught in the net of fisherman Angus Mactavish, and the two become fast friends. At night, Angus, his wife Sarah and Bruce Banner are abducted by Lord Black Jaimie Macawber, who wants to stop Angus from catching and killing the Loch Fear monster. Macawber sees the monster as a tourist attraction that has to be protected at all costs.
